data.name: CreateDocumentField
DeleteDocumentField
data.value: delete from CKT_DOCUMENT_FIELD where (FLD_NAME = @fldName) and (DOC_NAME = @docName) and (DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE = @docEffectiveDte)

data.name: ReadDocument
data.value: select top(1) NAME, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE from CKT_DOCUMENT where (NAME = @name) and (EXPIRATION_DATE = @expirationDate)

data.name: ReadDocumentField
data.value: select top(1) ORDER_POSITION, REQUIRED_SWITCH, SCREEN_PROMPT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, FLD_NAME, DOC_NAME, DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE from CKT_DOCUMENT_FIELD where (@docEffectiveDte = DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE) and (@docName = DOC_NAME) and (@fldName = FLD_NAME)

data.name: ReadField1
data.value: select top(1) NAME from CKT_FIELD where NAME = @name

data.name: ReadField2
data.value: select top(1) NAME from CKT_FIELD where NAME = @name

data.name: ReadFieldValue
data.value: select top(1) VALU, FLD_NAME, DOC_NAME, DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE, INF_IDENTIFIER from CKT_FIELD_VALUE where (@docEffectiveDte = DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE) and (@docName = DOC_NAME) and (@fldName = FLD_NAME)

data.name: UpdateDocumentField
data.value: update CKT_DOCUMENT_FIELD set ORDER_POSITION = @orderPosition, REQUIRED_SWITCH = @requiredSwitch, SCREEN_PROMPT = @screenPrompt, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (FLD_NAME = @fldName) and (DOC_NAME = @docName) and (DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE = @docEffectiveDte)
